subtitle: the revelation of Adam introduction the
revelation or apocalypse of Adam is a
mythic narration poem attributed to Adam
who communicated it to his son Seth
composed as early as the 1st or 2nd
century CE II this Jewish Gnostic
apocalypse which apparently no Christian
element in or amended to it is
recognized as a transition stage from
Jewish apocalypse to gnostic apocalypse
